resources.string: Last Pic is a simple app that shares the last picture you took. See what the world captures on their phone.
Book movie tickets for your family and friends!
Reminder! Your last picture will be uploaded. Please make sure it is something awesome and not something private.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Touch right part of the screen for the next picture.
Touch left part of the screen for the previous picture.
